name: AUAudioUnitBus
desc: The AUAudioUnitBus class defines an input or output connection point on an audio unit.

items.name: var format: AVAudioFormat
items.desc: The audio format and channel layout of audio being transferred on the bus.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the bus is active.

items.name: var index: Int
items.desc: The index of this bus in its containing array.

items.name: var ownerAudioUnit: AUAudioUnit
items.desc: The audio unit that owns the bus.

items.name: var supportedChannelLayoutTags: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An array of audio channel layout tags.

items.name: var contextPresentationLatency: TimeInterval
items.desc: Information about latency in the audio unit’s processing context.

items.name: init(format: AVAudioFormat)
items.desc: Initializes a bus object with a specific format.

items.name: var supportedChannelCounts: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: An array of numbers indicating the supported number of channels for this bus.

items.name: var maximumChannelCount: AUAudioChannelCount
items.desc: The maximum number of channels supported for this bus.
